DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate product performance visual acuity Bausch + Lomb investigational daily disposable contact lens compare currently market Johnson & Johnson Acuvue Moist contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Product Performance Daily Disposable Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Subjects must adapt soft contact lens wearer interested daily disposable wear currently adapt daily disposable soft contact lens wearer . Subjects must agree wear study lenses daily disposable basis approximately one week crossover wear another study lens one week . Subjects must correctable spherocylindrical refraction 32 letter ( 0.3 logMAR ) good ( distance , high contrast ) eye . Subjects must clear central cornea free anterior segment disorder . Subjects must myopic require lens correction 1.00 D 6.00 diopter ( D ) eye . Subjects worn gas permeable contact lenses within last 30 day worn polymethylmethacrylate lens within last 3 month . Subjects systemic disease currently affect ocular health Investigator 's opinion may affect ocular health course study . Subjects use systemic topical medication , Investigator 's opinion , affect ocular physiology lens performance . Subjects active ocular disease use ocular medication . Subjects correctable 32 letter ( 0.3 logMAR ) eye soft spherical contact lens . Subjects currently wear monovision , multifocal , toric contact lens . Subjects ocular astigmatism 1.00 D great either eye . Subjects anisometropia ( spherical equivalent ) great 1.00 D. Subjects grade 2 great find slit lamp examination ( refer Appendix B method clinical evaluation ) . Subjects corneal infiltrates , ANY GRADE , eligible . Subjects `` Present '' find slit lamp examination ( refer Appendix B method clinical evaluation ) , Investigator 's judgment , interfere contact lens wear . Subjects scar neovascularization within central 4 mm cornea . Subjects minor peripheral corneal scarring ( extend central area ) , Investigator 's judgment , interfere contact lens wear , eligible study . Subjects aphakic . Subjects amblyopic . Subjects presbyopia . Subjects corneal surgery ( eg , refractive surgery ) . Subjects allergic component study care product .
